fgeo.base 0.0.0.9001
  • Reference
  • fgeo

Reference

Edit data in place

fill_na()

Fill NA's with a single filler.

suffix_match()

Suffix a strings where a vector exactly matches one specific string.

to_tidy_names()

Create a names-friendly version of a string (lowercase and with no spaces).

Pick/drop rows with matching conditions

pick_dbh_min() pick_dbh_max() pick_dbh_under() pick_dbh_over() pick_status() drop_status()

Pick and drop rows of a ForestGEO ViewFullTable or census table.

pick_plotname()

Pick the given or first (alpha sorted) plot from a ViewFullTable.

drop_if_na()

Drop if missing values.

Find or approximate

find_datasets()

Find datasets in a package.

guess_max()

Guess maximum value of a vector with flexible accuracy.

guess_plotdim()

Guess plot dimensions.

round_any()

Round to multiple of any number. Copied from plyr:::round_any.numeric().

Assert

check_crucial_names()

Check if an object contains specific names.

exists_in_pkg()

Test if an object exists in the namespace of a package.

extract_insensitive() detect_insensitive()

Detect and extract matching strings -- ignoring case.

Predicates

detect_if()

Apply a predicate function to a column of a dataframe.

has_table_names()

Factory of predicates to check if a table has the same names as a reference.

is_multiple() is_duplicated()

Predicates to detect and flag duplicated and multiple values of a variable.

is_named()

Is named object? (Base-only version of rlang::is_named).

Throw conditions

warn_na() inform_na() abort_na()

Throw condition if variable has missing values.

flag_if()

Flag if a vector or dataframe-column meets a condition.

Deal with names

extract_insensitive() detect_insensitive()

Detect and extract matching strings -- ignoring case.

insensitive()

Create a vector or dataframe with case insensitive name matching.

name_dfs()

Identify each dataframe in a list with a name.

nms_pull_matches()

Pull names that match a character vector.

rename_matches()

Rename an object based on case-insensitive match of the names of a reference.

Construct or restructure data

gather_mat() gather_mats()

Gather matrix columns into a long-format dataframe.

Miscellaneous

`%||%`

Default value for NULL.

Access data

luquillo_stem_random_tiny luquillo_vft_4quad

Datasets from fgeo.data.
